item.title: Young writer, once a catering steward, now has his poems taught in universities
item.description: Young writer, once a catering steward, now has his poems taught in universities Ramesh Karthik, who used to work as a steward in catering events to earn some money to publish his books, has been writing on the culture and lifestyle of Banjara communities, adding a dash of fiction.
